data.title: 14 Best BleachBit Alternatives - Features, pros & cons, pricing | Remote Tools
data.meta_description: Check out this list of 14 best BleachBit alternatives. Compare the top features, pricing, pros & cons and user ratings to suit your needs.
data.text:
Snusbase is great for when you know that a website you use has been hacked so that you can make sure your data is safe. Features like ATO Prevention, Cleartext results, etc. make it ideal to keep your data secure.

Different companies can use Avast Antivirus to protect their employee's computers and mobile devices from viruses, spam, spyware, and other malicious programs or messages.

It uses sandboxes for isolating the computer from harmful applications and sites and SafeZone for providing a browser window free of data residue.
